segments.text: Eighty-five dollars . If my bid is the highest after three more days , I win ! It's fun !
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: We'll see how much fun it is after they take all your money ! !
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: But they won't ! I checked the seller's history , and he got good reviews from other buyers .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: What if he had his friends fake the reviews ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: You are so paranoid ! Not everybody is a crook , you know .
segments.speaker: S2
